column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Another special exhibit going on now until April 26 is the photography exhibit Regarding Heroes by Yousuf Karsh. Quite an extensive collection of black and white portraits
column2: Karsh photographed everyone from Winston Churchill to Brigitte Bardot and every writer
column4: politician and composer in between. The Photographs are of incredible quality and beauty
column5: and Karsh really shows the personality of his subjects. It might just be my own observation
column6: but the writers looked especially beat down
column7: with bags under their eyes and heavy expressions.
